page.title: 11AN ADULT'S DAY IN BURTON
page.content: On a normal day I rise at 5.30 a.m., get my bag ready for work, and let the dog out into the garden. For breakfast I have coffee and some muesli. I drive to work getting there about 6.40a.m.. I am a{Process Operator}at the{Gulf Oil Refinery}at Milford Haven. This involves grading and testing petrol. Sometimes I work in the control room where there are lots of computers and machinery to operate.I finish work at 7.00 p.m. and when I come home I have a meal, read the newspaper, then take the dog for a walk. Sometimes I play cricket with my son. If there is local cricket match I like to watch. Later in the evening I have a bath and watch television. At approximately 11.00 p.m. I usually have a cup of cocoa and go to bed.
